<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/group/"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the general information about all the groups, such as group ID and group manager.

**Note**: This method returns partial group information.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"List of groups","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"Name":{"type":"string","example":"Group Name"},"Id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","example":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000"},"Manager":{"type":"string","example":"Jake.Zazhitski"}},"title":"GroupWrapperSummary"}}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
